seriesJson.title: Minds of men
seriesJson.description: A series of explorations into effective living, combining dramatizations with commentary.

node.title: And mine alone
node.description: Jealousy as the evidence of insecurity in a relationship.

node.title: The long anger
node.description: Anger as a destructive, insidious, and permeating force.

node.title: The changing heart
node.description: The constantly changing aspects of evolving and maturing love relationships.

node.title: But only time for grief
node.description: Grief as a legitimate ingredient of abundant living.

node.title: The glass wall
node.description: This program analyzes the recognition and expression of feelings, attitudes, and needs imperative to mental, emotional and physical well-being.

node.title: I told my wrath
node.description: Anger as an emotion inevitable in active living.

node.title: Fettered are the free
node.description: Dependency as an inexcapable part of every human relationship.

node.title: The peacemaker
node.description: The true nature of peace, distortions of the peace concept, characteristics of the efficacious peacemaker.

node.title: God walks His softest in Grandmother's room
node.description: This program explores religion's role as a dynamic in effective living.

node.title: The distance within
node.description: This program explores how a disruption of the necessary balance between dependence and independence can mentally isolate someone from others around them.
